Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Feedback from teachers has generally been brief whilst GenAI feedback has greater detail and guidance to help fix my work.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback makes me feel more confident that I am meeting requirements in an assignment.
